bioconda.name: coatran
bioconda.summary: Coalescent tree simulation along a transmission network

biotools.summary: CoaTran is a tool that, given a transmission network and sample times, will simulate a coalescent phylogeny constrained by the transmission network.

bioschemas.name: CoaTran
bioschemas.summary: CoaTran is a tool that, given a transmission network and sample times, will simulate a coalescent phylogeny constrained by the transmission network.
